feed.title: GitHub Julia Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Julia in GitHub

entry.title: ranocha/SummationByPartsOperators.jl
entry.summary: A Julia library of summation-by-parts (SBP) operators used in finite difference, Fourier pseudospectral, continuous Galerkin, and discontinuous Galerkin methods to get provably stable semidiscretizations, paying special attention to boundary conditions.
